welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Evesham! Nestled in the heart of the picturesque Worcestershire countryside, this charming town is known for its rich history, delicious local produce, and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and experience all that Evesham has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gloucestershire Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport is the largest and busiest terminal, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at West Midlands International Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport handles all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport is used for military operations and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
